stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more shaper cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
text:
Draft format only.
If you have more [shaper] cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
title: Jamie "Bzzz" Micken: Techno Savant
